name: BADGERS!
body:
### Welcome to PDX Badgers Pages.
BADGER BADGER BADGER

### Getting Started
Some of use have [node mcu](http://nodemcu.com/index_en.html) boards as our esp8266 develoment platform for the software.  To get it up and running with Arduino, follow the directions at the [esp arduino project](https://github.com/esp8266/Arduino).  With that, you should be able to flash the nodemcu and go through some of the example projects in the esp folder under examples in the arduino IDE.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
